publ: by Gomathy Shankaran (DBA Kidz Learn Applications)
name: Animalcategories
0:
”Alexa, open animal categories”
”mammals”
”tell me about elephant”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal categories
des: Animal categories shows various animal categories with examples and images. Upon selecting a particular animal category from Mammals, Fishes, Reptiles, Amphibians, Birds and Bugs, the skill not only provides information detail on the selected category but also provides information on the habitat, characteristics of a particular animal belonging to that category with images. The images in the main category have animal sound on touch/tap . This skill is designed for echo , echo show , echo dot and other large devices.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
